郔字的基本解释

郔
yán
古地名（ａ．中国春秋时郑地，在今河南省郑州市南。ｂ．中国春秋时楚地，在今河南省项城县境）。

郔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》以然切，平仙，以。］
古地名。春秋郑地。即今河南滑县。

郔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1271第14
【唐韻】以然切【集韻】【正韻】夷然切，?音延。【說文】鄭北地。【左傳·宣三年】晉侯伐鄭，及郔。　又楚地。【左傳·宣十一年】楚左尹子重侵宋，王待諸郔。

郔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郔字的起名意思

古地名。

Tang
Basic explanation of words
Tang
yán
Ancient place names (a. Zhengdi in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, south of Zhengzhou City, Henan Province. b. Chudi in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, in Xiangcheng County, Henan Province).
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" Yiran cut, Pingxian, with. ]
Ancient place names. Chunqiu Zhengdi. Now Huaxian County, Henan Province.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郔; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 1271 14
[Tang Yun] Cut Yi Ran [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Cut it at ease,? Sound extension. [Said the text] Zheng Beidi. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Three Years] The Marquis of Jin Dynasty defeated Zheng and Zhi.　Crossly again. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan eleventh year] Chu Zuo Yinzi invaded the Song Dynasty again, and the king waited for Zhu Xi.

Name meaning
Ancient place names.
yán
собств. ист., геогр. Янь (населённый пункт на территории нынешней пров. Хэнань в эпоху Чуньцю)
